data.title: China consumers use AI to alter product photos, claim refunds for ‘damaged’ goods
data.description: ‘Immoral’ online buyers create fake discrepancies across range of products; experts warn AI bandits that they could be committing fraud.
data.keywords: China, Chinese, AI, artificial intelligence , consumer, products, goods, damaged,  refunds, scams, frauds, online shops, e commerce, preventive measures, legal protection, refund policy, compensation, dishonest, AI manipulated, AI generated, buying, shopping, online sale, online shopping, electric, toothbrush, rusty, garment, cracks, safety, video, fake, credit, detectors, investment, expert, law, firm, scam, banned, authentic, evidence, consumers, Shaanxi Zhongzhi Law Firm, Liu Dongchen, Alibaba Group, Tmall Group, e-commerce, Taobao, damaged products, Jiemian News, Double 11 shopping festival, refunds, AI-generated photos
